segments.text: I see the boy climbing on that stool, and it makes me so nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching for the cookie jar, and the stool is wobbling beneath him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just know he's going to fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie, not a care in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn't even seem to notice how dangerous this situation is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish their mother would turn around and see what they're up to.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But she's just standing there, drying dishes and not noticing anything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is overflowing, and the kids are about to make a mess with the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope everyone stays safe and no one gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I have a feeling this is not going to end well.
segments.speaker: PAR
